ModMetaData.name: [ATW] Ridiculous Alpaca Variety
ModMetaData.author: MG_Atwood
ModMetaData.description:
Ever felt your colonists need more alpaca colours in their lives? Now they can have a ridiculous number! This mod adds over 120 alpaca coat variations so even Alpaca 43 can feel special.
This mod shouldn't affect alpaca variants added by other mods, only the vanilla alpacas. Load after Vanilla Textures Expanded or any other texture-altering mods that affect vanilla alpacas.
